casebody.data:
IN RE: Melanie K. SHRELL NO. 2018-OB-0974 Supreme Court of Louisiana. June 25, 2018

ORDER

Considering the Joint Petition for Transfer to Disability Inactive Status,

IT IS ORDERED that Melanie K. Shrell, Louisiana Bar Roll number 30961, be and she hereby is transferred to disability inactive status. All disciplinary proceedings against respondent shall be deferred until such time as she resumes active status.

Pursuant to Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 26(E), this order shall be effective immediately.
